channel.title: [Pi] Help [Pi]
channel.description: Hey guys, so I'm trying to use uTorrent to port forward because my ISP doesn't allow me to properly port forward. So I downloaded uTorrent, went to Options > Prefferences > Connection and set the port to 43594, unchecked the randomize port button, checked all of the rest, and I opened up my no-ip and made sure all the ips were correct in my client. But after I tried to log in, it still say Error Connecting to Server.. What else do I need to do to make this work?

item.title: [Pi] Help [Pi]
item.dc:creator: @b00mz1029 b00mz1029
item.description:
@b00mz1029 wrote:

Hey guys, so I’m trying to use uTorrent to port forward because my ISP doesn’t allow me to properly port forward. So I downloaded uTorrent, went to Options > Prefferences > Connection and set the port to 43594, unchecked the randomize port button, checked all of the rest, and I opened up my no-ip and made sure all the ips were correct in my client. But after I tried to log in, it still say Error Connecting to Server… What else do I need to do to make this work?

Read full topic
